Rulings.Tengu:
●Rainbow Path targets the attacking monster. Sending a Crystal Beast card from your Spell and Trap Card Zone to your GY is a cost.
●Any Crystal Beast card in your Spell and Trap Card Zone can be used to pay the cost. If the Crystal Beast card is being treated as an Equip Card, it can be used to pay the cost.
●You do not have to add a Rainbow Dragon or Dark Rainbow Dragon to your hand.
●If Rainbow Path fails to negate the monster's attack, you cannot add Rainbow Dragon or Dark Rainbow Dragon to your hand.

Rulings.Base:
1. "Rainbow Path" targets the attacking monster. Sending a 'Crystal Beast' card from your Spell and Trap Card Zone to your GY is a cost.
2. Any 'Crystal Beast' card in your Spell and Trap Card Zone can be used to pay the cost. If the 'Crystal Beast' card is being treated as an Equip Card, it can be used to pay the cost.
3. You do not have to add a "Rainbow Dragon" or "Rainbow Dark Dragon" to your hand.
4. If "Rainbow Path" fails to negate the monster's attack, you cannot add "Rainbow Dragon" or "Rainbow Dark Dragon" to your hand.
